verses.name: 2 Samuel 14:4
verses.text: And when the woman of Tekoah spake to the king, she fell on her face to the ground, and did obeisance, and said, Help, O king.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 14:5
verses.text: And the king said unto her, What aileth thee? And she answered, I am indeed a widow woman, and mine husband is dead.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 14:6
verses.text: And thy handmaid had two sons, and they two strove together in the field, and there was none to part them, but the one smote the other, and slew him.
